name: Beesweeper (SphaeriCactus)
description:
Hello, World!

This is a game that I made based on Minesweeper!

Note: You have to first visit at least one other page before pressing play. This is a bug that has persisted for quite a while now, so please feel free to post a solution in the comments!

You can find the code here: https://github.com/SphaeriCactus/Khan-Academy/tree/gh-pages/Beesweeper

I made it with the help of a video tutorial posted on YouTube by Daniel Shiffman (The Coding Train). You can view it below:

I hope you enjoy my game! :)
